code:
%%{
  init: {
    'theme': 'base',
    'themeVariables': {
        'background': '#fff',
      'primaryColor': '#CE3518',
      'primaryTextColor': '#fff',
      'primaryBorderColor': '#000',
      'lineColor': '#000',
      'secondaryColor': '#000',
      'tertiaryColor': '#ffff',
      'fontFamily': 'EB Garamond',
    }
  }
}%%
flowchart TB
    subgraph Analysis
        direction TB

        subgraph Databases
            data-genome[NCBI Genomes/EGA]
            data-seq-dna[NCBI SRA: DNA]
            data-seq-rna[NCBI SRA: RNA]
            data-ass[NCBI Genomes/Assemblies]
        end

        subgraph DNA Sequencing
            direction TB
            d-hyp[Hypothesis]
            d-expdesign[Experimental Design]
            d-purification[Purification]
            d-libprep[Library Preparation]
            d-sequencing[Sequencing]

            d-hyp --> d-expdesign --> d-purification --> d-libprep --> d-sequencing --> data-seq-dna
        end

        subgraph RNA Sequencing
            direction TB
            r-hyp[Hypothesis]
            r-expdesign[Experimental Design]
            r-purification[Purification]
            r-libprep[Library Preparation]
            r-sequencing[Sequencing]

            r-hyp --> r-expdesign --> r-purification --> r-libprep --> r-sequencing --> data-seq-rna
        end


        subgraph Assembly
            direction TB

            qca[Quality Control]
            ass[Assemble]
            filt[Filter]
            qca2[Assembly QC]

            data-seq-dna --> qca
            d-sequencing --> qca --> filt --> ass --> qca2 --> data-ass
            filt --> qca
            ass --> ass
        end
        subgraph Annotation
            direction TB

            ref[Lcal Reference Genome]
            struc[Structural Annotation]
            sqc[QC]
            func[Functional Annotation]
            fqc[QC]
            onto[Enrich with ontology terms]
            ogs[Official Gene Set]

            data-ass --> struc
            data-genome --> func
            dna-seq-rna --> func
            ref --> struc --> sqc --> func --> fqc --> onto --> ogs --> data-genome
            sqc --> struc
            fqc --> func 
        end
        subgraph Mapping
            direction TB
            ngs-filt[Filter]
            ngs-qc[Quality Control]
            ngs-align[Alignment]
            ngs-qc2[QC again]

            data-seq-dna --> ngs-qc
            d-sequencing -->ngs-qc -->  ngs-filt -->  ngs-align --> ngs-qc2 --> data-seq-dna
            ngs-filt --> ngs-qc
            ngs-align --> ngs-align
        end


        subgraph "Differential Expression"
            direction TB
            de-mapping[Splice Aware Mapper]
            de-counting[Counting]
            deseq[Differential Expression Analysis]
            de-viz[Visualisation]
            de-go[GO Term Enrichment]
            de-path[Pathway Analysis]

            r-sequencing --> de-mapping
            data-genome --> de-mapping
            data-seq-rna --> de-mapping
            de-mapping --> de-counting --> deseq --> de-viz
            de-viz --> de-path
            de-viz --> de-go

        end

    end

    subgraph Prerequisites
    direction LR
    subgraph Computation
        direction TB

        s[Schedulers]
        deps[Dependency Management]
        dist[Software Distribution]
        os[Operating Systems]
        code[Code Repositories]
        dataz[Data Repositories]
        job[A single computation]


        os --> s --> deps --> dist --> job
        
        code --> dist
        dist --> deps

        deps --> job
        dataz --> job


    end
    subgraph Ethics
        direction LR

        e-c[Consent]
        e-g[GDPR]
        e-p[Privacy]
        e-c --- e-g --- e-p
    end
    subgraph FAIR
        direction LR
        Findable --- Accessible --- Interoperable --- Reproducible
    end
    subgraph RDM
        direction LR
        ds[Data Storage]
        dmp[Data Management Plan]
        dmp --> ds
        dmplegal[Legal Requirements] --> ds
    end
    subgraph Education
        direction LR

        edbloom[Bloom's Taxonomy]
        edmeth[Didactic Methods]
        edact[Activities]
        edlos[Learning Objectives]
        edeval[Evauation]
        edass[Assessment]
        edtgt[Target Audience]
        edbkg[Background Knowledge]
        %% edqc[Quality Control]

        resource[A Single Learning Resource]

        edmeth --> resource
        edbloom --> resource
        edact --> resource
        edlos  --> resource
        edeval  --> resource
        edass  --> resource
        edtgt --> resource
        edbkg --> resource
        %% edqc --> resource 
        %% resource --> edqc
    end
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
